name: George Was Alone
description:
George Was Alone it's an epic video game where your job is to find the way and have new friends, inspired in "Thomas Was Alone" but with a new mechanics that make most original the game, like the gravity zero mechanic and the rotate mechanic, enjoy the videogame!

-The Big 8 Bit's.

-Contact us: thebig8bits@gmail.com

Music by 2048 seo.
